tags.name: back-top
tags.description:
A floating Button that scrolls you back top.

Slots:

  * `default` {} - This element has a slot

Attributes:

  * `animationIn` {`string`} - Animation in.

  * `animationOut` {`string`} - Animation out.

  * `threshold` {`number`} - When to show element in px from top.

  * `top` {`number`} - Where to scroll to in px from top.

  * `smoothScroll` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

Properties:

  * `styles` {`CSSResult`} - 

  * `animationIn` {`string`} - Animation in.

  * `animationOut` {`string`} - Animation out.

  * `threshold` {`number`} - When to show element in px from top.

  * `top` {`number`} - Where to scroll to in px from top.

  * `smoothScroll` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

  * `scrollOptions` - Build scroll settings object.

  * `_onScroll` - Use Arrow function, thus this is this component and not window

attributes.name: threshold
attributes.description:
`threshold` {`number`} - When to show element in px from top.

Property: threshold

Default: 200

attributes.name: top
attributes.description:
`top` {`number`} - Where to scroll to in px from top.

Property: top

Default: 0

attributes.name: smoothScroll
attributes.description:
`smoothScroll` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

Property: smoothScroll

Default: true

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description:
`hidden` {`boolean`} - Use smooth scroll or instant scroll.

Property: hidden

Default: true
